# Euphoric Cloud (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Poison Spells|poison]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (rare mushrooms worth 5 gp)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide (Paizo), pg. 181

You create a bank of fog similar to that created by *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]* except its vapors are intoxicating. Living creatures in the cloud become [[Fascinated|fascinated]]. This condition lasts as long as a creature is in the cloud and for 1d4+1 rounds after it leaves. Any creature that succeeds at its save but remains in the cloud must continue to save each round on your turn.
